title: The 1% rule
description: What are you going to do today to improve your life? 1% can make all the difference!  ========================== Congratulations to our winners: ========================== 12 months access to lammle.com: - cai thomas - Khusan - Mujahid alnour  A book written by Todd Lammle: - Jonathan Pratt - Eero Nevaluoto - Ibrahim gndz - Pelumi Magbagbeola - Roberto Martin - Andrei Nizenta  Giveaway: ======== Platinum access to lammle.com (3 winners):  Todd Lammle's books (6 winners):  My courses (lots of winners): Links in video  Atomic habits:   ================ Connect with Todd: ================ Website:  LinkedIn:  Twitter:   ================ Connect with me: ================ Discord:  Twitter:   Instagram:   LinkedIn:   Facebook:   TikTok:  YouTube:    Boson software: 15% discount Link: bit.ly/boson15 Code: DAVF15P  ccna ccna 200-301 devnet ccnp ccnp encor linux python todd lammle todd lammle ccna firepower ansible ccie cisco firepower  Please note that links listed may be affiliate links and provide me with a small percentage/kickback should you use them to purchase any of the items listed or recommended. Thank you for supporting me and this channel!   #ccna #python #comptia
transcript: (birds chirping) (upbeat music) - Recognize this place? Very famous, Stonehenge. Beautiful, beautiful day. What are you gonna do with your life today to make your tomorrow better? (upbeat music) What are you gonna do today to make your life better tomorrow? Are you working for the long term or just for the short term? You need to think long term, don't think short term. So again, what are you doing today to make your tomorrows better? What are you doing with your time today? Are you studying? Are you investing in yourself? Are you investing in your future, or are you wasting your time? (upbeat music) Make sure that your future self, in other words, yourself two years from today or five years from today, or 10 or 20 years from today, thanks you for what you did today and what you're going to do every day from now on to make your future better. Think about it as follows, if you just invest a bit of time every day making yourself better, improving yourself, you will exponentially improve yourself in the coming years. Don't spend time on things that don't make a difference, don't spend time on things that are here today and gone tomorrow. Spend time on things that will improve your life but also improve the lives of your children and perhaps your grandchildren in future. Invest with the long-term in mind. Now I've mentioned this book in the past and I'll mention it again, Atomic Habits, fantastic book. Talks about this whole paradigm or way of thinking that if you make incremental changes in your life today, small changes, it can make a huge difference over a period of months or years. 1% change every day, 1% improvement every day makes a dramatic improvement over a period of time. If you just improve your life little by little every day, it makes a massive change over a number of months or years. But now let's get practical, people often ask, how do I improve my life?
